name: The Horde Needs More Heavy Leather!
tooltip:
The Horde Needs More Heavy Leather!

It's true, <class>, I still need more heavy leather. The requests from the generals and their quartermasters seem endless. And that's nothing compared to what the zeppelin masters are asking for!

I need to get my quota collected on the double. <name>, bring me more stacks of heavy leather as soon as you can!

Requirements:
- Heavy Leather x 10
